subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick won the Queen’s Club title Sunday, saving match point in the second set before beating France’s Nicolas Mahut in the final of the grass-court tuneup for Wimbledon.
snippet: Andy Roddick won the Queen’s Club title Sunday, saving match point in the second set before beating France’s Nicolas Mahut in the final of the grass-court tuneup for Wimbledon.
